==打开binlog==
文件 `my.cnf` :
{{{
binlog-format=(mixed|row|statement)

log-bin=master-bin
log-bin-index=master-bin.index
}}}


{{{
show master status;

show slave status;

show slave hosts;
}}}

{{{
show binlog events [in 'mysqlbin-bin.000001'] [limit 10];

$ mysqlbinlog mysql-bin.000001
}}}
